price: Na pia kwa kufuru zao na kumsingizia kwao Maryamu uwongo mkubwa.
arabic: وَبِكُفۡرِهِمۡ وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ عَلَىٰ مَرۡيَمَ بُهۡتَٰنًا عَظِيمٗا
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu amewaghadhibikia Mayahudi kwa sababu ya kufru yao na kumzulia Maryam uzushi mkubwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wabikuf'rihim waqawlihim ʿalā maryama buh'tānan ʿaẓīman
